title: Salamander mystic
data:

| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A member of the salamander's scholarly caste, possessed of lesser size and strength, but wise in the ways of magic. |

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Spells](#Spells)
- [3 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

Distant relatives of the [nagas](/List_of_nagas "List of nagas"), **salamander mystics** are magically-gifted, fiery snake men that possess the ability to [haste](/Haste "Haste") their allies and pelt you with modestly powerful [conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations"). Unsurprisingly, they are immune to [fire](/Fire "Fire") and vulnerable to [cold](/Cold "Cold"). They can be found in the [Snake Pit](/Snake_Pit "Snake Pit").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                        |                                                     |
| :---------- | ------------------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Force Lance](/Force_Lance "Force Lance") (3d15)       | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Bolt of Magma](/Bolt_of_Magma "Bolt of Magma") (3d18) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Haste Other](/Haste_Other "Haste Other")              | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- Fire resistance greatly reduces their ability to deal damage to you, but even then they can still provide dangerous support for their allies.
- [Haste Other](/Haste_Other "Haste Other") only works on monsters of the same "[genus](/Type "Type")" - this includes salamanders and nagas, but not snakes.

## History

- Prior to [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), salamander mystics had [Iskenderun's Mystic Blast](/Iskenderun%27s_Mystic_Blast "Iskenderun's Mystic Blast") instead of [Force Lance](/Force_Lance "Force Lance").
- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), salamander mystics had [Localized Ignite Poison](/Localized_Ignite_Poison "Localized Ignite Poison") in their spellset, making them dangerous to characters that had been heavily poisoned by nagas.
- Prior to [0.17](/0.17 "0.17"), Localized Ignite Poison always affected players with naturally poisonous flesh ([nagas](/Naga "Naga"), [kobolds](/Kobold "Kobold"), green [draconians](/Draconian "Draconian"), or [Spider Form](/Spider_Form "Spider Form"))
- Salamander mystics were added in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14").
html:
Salamander mystic

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
salamander mystic N 
HP 42-87
HD 10
XP 770
Speed 10 (swim: 70%)
AC 5
EV 7
Will 60
Attack1 10 (hit: fire)


Resistances rF+++
Vulnerabilities Cold
Habitat Amphibious lava
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type naga, salamander
Flags Warm-blooded
A member of the salamander's scholarly caste, possessed of lesser size and strength, but wise in the ways of magic.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Spells
  • 3 Tips & Tricks
  • 4 History

Useful Info

Distant relatives of the nagas, salamander mystics are magically-gifted, fiery snake men that possess the ability to haste their allies and pelt you with modestly powerful conjurations. Unsurprisingly, they are immune to fire and vulnerable to cold. They can be found in the Snake Pit.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Force Lance (3d15) Wizard flag
Slot2 Bolt of Magma (3d18) Wizard flag
Slot3 Haste Other Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Fire resistance greatly reduces their ability to deal damage to you, but even then they can still provide dangerous support for their allies.
  • Haste Other only works on monsters of the same "genus" - this includes salamanders and nagas, but not snakes.

History

  • Prior to 0.25, salamander mystics had Iskenderun's Mystic Blast instead of Force Lance.
  • Prior to 0.18, salamander mystics had Localized Ignite Poison in their spellset, making them dangerous to characters that had been heavily poisoned by nagas.
  • Prior to 0.17, Localized Ignite Poison always affected players with naturally poisonous flesh (nagas, kobolds, green draconians, or Spider Form)
  • Salamander mystics were added in 0.14.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Salamander_mystic&oldid=74687"

rawPage:
{{version030}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
Distant relatives of the [[list of nagas|nagas]], '''salamander mystics''' are magically-gifted, fiery snake men that possess the ability to [[haste]] their allies and pelt you with modestly powerful [[conjurations]]. Unsurprisingly, they are immune to [[fire]] and vulnerable to [[cold]]. They can be found in the [[Snake Pit]].

{{monster spells}}

==Tips & Tricks==
*Fire resistance greatly reduces their ability to deal damage to you, but even then they can still provide dangerous support for their allies.
*[[Haste Other]] only works on monsters of the same "[[type|genus]]" - this includes salamanders and nagas, but not snakes.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.25]], salamander mystics had [[Iskenderun's Mystic Blast]] instead of [[Force Lance]].
*Prior to [[0.18]], salamander mystics had [[Localized Ignite Poison]] in their spellset, making them dangerous to characters that had been heavily poisoned by nagas.
*Prior to [[0.17]], Localized Ignite Poison always affected players with naturally poisonous flesh ([[naga]]s, [[kobold]]s, green [[draconian]]s, or [[Spider Form]])
*Salamander mystics were added in [[0.14]].
